case.title: American guy coming between 18th - 20th August to London - 33 (London, Ealing)
case.text:
Hello ladies,
I am Matt, I am 33 and I will be coming to UK in August for a few days. I am good looking, 6.3", well employed gentleman who is looking to have unforgettable experience in the UK capital.
Write me, tell me something about you and meet me when I arrive :)
